bibl.author: RATHBONE, Dominic W.

bibl.note: I. Introduction. - II. Demography. - III. Land and Agriculture. - IV. Urbanization and Craft Production. - V. Trade and Transport. - VI. Prices, Prosperity, Monetization. - VII. Taxation and the State. - VIII. Conclusion.
